name: Gift of the Seasons
description:
Gift of the Seasons is a four level platformer where you collect each season's unique collectables and aim to get the fastest time possible on each level.

There is currently an issue where if you try and mute the music in the menus without playing in full screen mode, it wont respond. This is an issue we are unsure how to fix, since it only appeared after uploading to itch.io. Play full screen for best results.

Controls:

  • Movement/Jump - Arrow Keys
  • Break Blocks - SPACE
  • Use the Mouse to navigate menus and use buttons.
  • Change Character - C (Once Unlocked)

This game is a collaboration project with Georgia0033 for the Chelmsford College - Christmas Jam.
